languages.text: "Мы оба защищали то, что нам дорого, так, как научила нас жизнь. И сегодня моей душе особенно спокойно, ибо боль предстоящей битвы мы сможем разделить на двоих".
"We both defended what we held dear, just as life has taught us. And today my soul is at peace, for we can share the pain of the coming battle between us so it is diminished."
languages.original_text: "Мы оба защищали то, что нам дорого, так, как научила нас жизнь. И сегодня моей душе особенно спокойно, ибо боль предстоящей битвы мы сможем разделить на двоих".

traits.locale_text: "We both defended what we held dear the way life had taught us. And today my soul is at peace, for we can share the pain of the upcoming battle between us so it is diminished."
"We both defended what we held dear the way life had taught us. And today my soul is at peace, for we can share the pain of the upcoming battle between us so it is diminished."
"We both defended what we held dear, just as life has taught us. And today my soul is at peace, for we can share the pain of the coming battle between us so it is diminished."
"We both defended what we held dear, just as life has taught us. And today my soul is at peace, for we can share the pain of the coming battle between us so it is diminished."
"We both defended what we held dear, just as life has taught us. And today my soul is at peace, for we can share the pain of the coming battle between us so it is diminished."

languages.text: “我们一起捍卫着我们珍视的一切，正如生活对我们的教导一样。战斗即将到来，但我的灵魂却无比平静，因为我们会共同分担即将到来的痛苦，每个人承受的痛苦都会减轻。”
languages.original_text: "We both defended what we held dear, just as life has taught us. And today my soul is at peace, for we can share the pain of the coming battle between us so it is diminished."

traits.locale_text: “我们一起捍卫着我们珍视的一切，正如生活对我们的教导一样。战斗即将到来，但我的灵魂却无比平静，因为我们会共同分担即将到来的痛苦，每个人承受的痛苦都会减轻。”

languages.text: «L{mf|o|a}s dos hemos defendido lo que valoramos, tal y como la vida nos ha enseñado. Y hoy mi alma está en paz, pues podemos compartir el dolor de la próxima batalla entre amb{mf|o|a}s, reduciendo así su carga».
languages.original_text: "We both defended what we held dear, just as life has taught us. And today my soul is at peace, for we can share the pain of the coming battle between us so it is diminished."

traits.locale_text: «L{mf|o|a}s dos hemos defendido lo que valoramos, tal y como la vida nos ha enseñado. Y hoy mi alma está en paz, pues podemos compartir el dolor de la próxima batalla entre amb{mf|o|a}s, reduciendo así su carga».

languages.text: 「人生で教わったように、私たちは2人とも大切なものを守ったのだ。それに今、私の魂は安らいでいる。これから始まる戦いの痛みを分かち合い、痛みを和らげることができるからだ」
languages.original_text: "We both defended what we held dear, just as life has taught us. And today my soul is at peace, for we can share the pain of the coming battle between us so it is diminished."

traits.locale_text: 「人生で教わったように、私たちは2人とも大切なものを守ったのだ。それに今、私の魂は安らいでいる。これから始まる戦いの痛みを分かち合い、痛みを和らげることができるからだ」

languages.text: "Wir haben beide verteidigt, was uns wichtig war, genau wie das Leben es uns gelehrt hat. Und heute herrscht in meiner Seele Frieden, denn wir können den Schmerz der kommenden Schlacht teilen und ihn so lindern."
languages.original_text: "We both defended what we held dear, just as life has taught us. And today my soul is at peace, for we can share the pain of the coming battle between us so it is diminished."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben beide verteidigt, was uns wichtig war, genau wie das Leben es uns gelehrt hat. Und heute herrscht in meiner Seele Frieden, denn wir können den Schmerz der kommenden Schlacht teilen und ihn so lindern."

languages.text: « Nous avons {mf|tous|toutes} deux défendu ce qui nous était cher, comme la vie nous l'a appris. Et aujourd'hui, mon âme est en paix, car nous pouvons alléger notre peine en partageant le fardeau du combat à venir. »
languages.original_text: "We both defended what we held dear, just as life has taught us. And today my soul is at peace, for we can share the pain of the coming battle between us so it is diminished."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons {mf|tous|toutes} deux défendu ce qui nous était cher, comme la vie nous l'a appris. Et aujourd'hui, mon âme est en paix, car nous pouvons alléger notre peine en partageant le fardeau du combat à venir. »

languages.text: "Her ikimiz de değer verdiğimiz şeyleri savunduk. Tıpkı hayatın bize yapmamızı öğrettiği gibi. Bugün ruhum huzur içinde çünkü önümüzdeki savaşın neden olacağı acıyı aramızda bölüşerek azaltabiliriz."
languages.original_text: "We both defended what we held dear, just as life has taught us. And today my soul is at peace, for we can share the pain of the coming battle between us so it is diminished."
